LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: To configure this plugin navigate to the respective product category or product for which you want to add a custom banner and choose in the tab Banner the picture you want to display in the header area. For an optimal result use images that have the size of your shop width (1170px) and the height of the banner height that was configured here.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxBannerHeight.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines the maximum height for the banner area.

LocaleResource.Name: StretchPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether the banner will be stretched over the complete width that's available.
